sub_title: Presenter & Marketeer & Consultant, boosting event experiences 🎫🎀✨ Host & Reporter🎤🎙️ Academic & Vibrant MICE Happyholic (for over 10 years)🚀 Remote Content Creator (Owner of Jess is More)🌴Networker & Connector🤝🏽
summary:
"Give the world your best and the best will come to you" - Madeline Bridge

I'm Jess, and with my company Jess is More Media my mission is to create valuable and inspirational content: from texts to vlogs and everything in between!

-----

Gepassioneerde werknemer, ondernemer, vrijwilliger én singer-song-writer, huh? 🤯 Jazeker, die energieke duizendpoot, dat ben ik, Jess! Ik doe een hoop, maar niet teveel. Ik ben eindeloos gefascineerd en wil me altijd laten verwonderen.

treasury_media.title: Jessica Meijer: “Ik ken veel verschillende bedrijfsculturen en dat is waardevol”
treasury_media.description: Onze potentiële TechGirl van de Maand Jessica Meijer heeft al veel werkgevers op haar cv staan, maar dat is volgens haar een kracht en geen zwakte.

profile_positions.title: Senior Content & Event Producer | Communication Allrounder | Field Marketing & PR | MICE Specialist

profile_positions.description:
★ Content Creator ★ 
I make business video's (as well as reporter and also as corporate vlogger). These video's are the perfect way to communicate with your stakeholders. Need to broadcast an interview, use an inspiring recruitment video to attract talent or a video to inform your employees? I'm your woman! Let's go! 🚀

★ Copy Writer ★ 
My passion is helping companies in telling their corporate story. With my interest and fascination for sustainability, vitality, societal issues (e.g. Diversity), digital transformation and innovation, talent management and education, I love to write about these topics. Need any help in setting a proper content strategy and the corresponding texts? Jess is More will help you! Message me for more information.

★ Public Speaker (Host & Trainer) ★ Event Organizer ★ 
I'm happy to organize, host and/or speak at events, congresses and festivals. I'm offering the complete package. Challenging the status quo! Ready for the show? Need an enthusiastic public speaker or event organizer for your event? Drop me a message!
profile_positions.title: Founder of Jess is More Communication ★ Editor & Creator Digital Channels ★ Moderator & Reporter ★

profile_positions.description:
I have a passion for innovating and improving business outcomes leveraging human sciences, D&I principles, innovation and design, engagement and community building.

We at Rogha help business leaders build successful organizations. Will we accelerate your business transformation? Contact me for the opportunities! 📊
profile_positions.title: Senior Management Consultant (People & Talent | Strategy | Change | D&I | Branding | Training)

profile_positions.description:
Accelerating the digital economy: Gender diversity in the telecommunications sector. 

Women Connected works with internal and external partners to deliver socio-economic benefits to women and the broader mobile ecosystem through greater inclusion of women across the industry. The programme is focused on increasing women’s access to and use of mobile phones and life-enhancing mobile services in developing markets, as well as closing the digital skills gender gap, attracting and retaining female talent, and encouraging female leadership in technology on a national basis.
profile_positions.title: Chair Women Connected

profile_positions.description: With more than 8,000 colleagues, we offer our customers the best in entertainment, mobile telephony, fixed telephony and Internet. With our products and services we inspire people, businesses and society to make contact. As a Business Process Improvement Specialist I'm part of the Knowledge Management Team within VodafoneZiggo. The Knowledge Distribution Team within the Customer Experience & Processes Department is continually managing and improving corporate and service knowledge. In addition to these Development Operations (DevOps) we're part of the agile/digital transformation, creating microservice content for all communication channels in the cloud ☁ using Oracle Knowledge Application (OKA).
profile_positions.title: Business Process Improvement / Knowledge Specialist / Communication (Agile WoW)

profile_positions.description:
Sustainable Employability: researchers and recruiters say that demanding that employers treat employees well is part of the value system of the youngest generation of workers.

Sustainable employability is a socially important theme, especially in relation to the ageing population and the expected tightness on the labour market. Organisations and employees can work towards sustainable employability. Specific policies with a focus on health, safety, career development and vitality will lead to sustainable employability and energetic organisations.
profile_positions.title: Vitality Employment Program Management (🏆 2nd place Young Professional of the Year 2020)

profile_positions.description:
NLdigital NextGen is a network of young professionals working across the ICT industry. It provides 
young digital talent a platform to discuss, innovate and share knowledge without boundaries. "Serious Fun" is our starting point, knowledge sharing our purpose.
profile_positions.title: Vice-President & Creative Chief Operations Officer of the NextGen Board

profile_positions.description:
Happy to announce that I accepted the request to join EDITx as the new Business Boardmember of their International Advisory Board. I will be responsible for the exchange of insights regarding IT education and business in the Netherlands. Besides that, I will provide valuable and up-to-date advice on this issue. Want to know more? Drop me a message! 📲

EDITx: Challenges, Quizzes & Education in IT for everybody!
#education #business #newchallenge #newteam
profile_positions.title: Business & Education Advisor in the International Board

profile_positions.description:
I participated in a large-scale Dutch speech collection project. As a qualified participant I recorded short phrases on a recording application. The purpose of this project is to improve language and voice recognition technologies.

To qualify to participate, you must be a native speaker of Dutch from the Netherlands, be located in the Netherlands, have an Android smartphone and be able to record 200 short sentences in Dutch on a free app from the Google Play Store.
profile_positions.title: (Remote) Computational Linguist & Voice Respondent for AI-Development

profile_positions.description:
At the International Institute of Research (IIR) we organize quality events with topics such as Data Science 📊, Blockchain ❂, Artificial Intelligence (AI) and Cloud ☁ with the use of digital Growth Hacking 🚀.

As Medior Level Sales Consultant I offer IIR partners the possibility to present themselves to their target audience during our congresses. As a partnermanager within the event industry I engage our IIR clients with state of the art topics and present a qualified network to them through a B2B collaboration. Activities such as quality management, database research, consultative sales, marketing, consulting, internal and external communications, public relations (PR), event coordination and stakeholdermanagement are predominant within this multidimensional role. Currently, I'm involved with topics such as Artificial Intelligence (AI) & ePrivacy. Questions or comments? Do not hesitate to contact me.
profile_positions.title: Partner Manager & Brand Consultant in ICT & Finance Industry
Young Oracle Boardmember specialized in Event Coordination & Marketing Growth Hacking

profile_positions.description:
As Head of Oracle Academy I was involved in (IT) Education and Stakeholder Management within the Oracle Academy Education Program, with the Netherlands and Belgium as my working area. Activities such as database management, database research, marketing, consulting, internal communications, public relations (PR) and stakeholdermanagement were predominant within this multidimensional role. I was responsible for all the activities within the Oracle Academy. Oracle Academy offers teachers of Dutch higher education institutes free trainings in Java, Database, PL/SQL, Big Data, IoT and Cloud Computing. This is done with the goal to improve the education system with respect to the future needed IT-skills of graduates. Together we could create a future Edutopia!

Next to that, I supported and facilitated activities for StartUps and the 'Volunteering and Giving' department of Oracle. A big part of the job was also to organize diverse events, from events for Recruiting and Partnerships as well as Volunteering- and Education projects.
profile_positions.title: Program Manager Benelux in Education & Business & Corporate Social Responsibility Coordinator

volunteer_experiences.description:
As My Treats continues to gain steam 🚀 and is getting positive feedback 💓, we’re gearing up to elevate our impact and would love for you to play a pivotal role in this exciting journey!

🌟The My Treats Ambassador Program! 🌟

We’re a group of passionate and motivated people, My Treats Ambassadors, across all 12 provinces in The Netherlands! 🤗

As an ambassador, I’ll get to:
🕵️ Scout and reach out to potential restaurants 🍜
🌮 Try out new partner restaurants and provide feedback
📣 Promote My Treats and contribute to shaping our future 💬

We are people who...:
🍴 Have a love for the dining scene
🥦 Are passionate about healthy and sustainable food
🌿 Have a strong affinity with My Treats values and believe in transforming the restaurant industry for the better

I'm ready to discover champion, tasty, healthy, and sustainable dining options!

Let's be hungry for better, together 🌱,
The My Treats Team


OUR MISSION IS TO MAKE HEALTHY AND SUSTAINABLE FOOD ATTRACTIVE AND EASILY ACCESSIBLE.
AND TO GET THERE, WE COULD USE SOME HELP🙏

Here is what we do:
👉 Spread the word: forward this email and recommend people to download the app.
👉 Get restaurants excited about Treats: ask them about their story, their values, where their products come from… And if they’re not on Treats yet, ask them why not? 😇
👉 Recommend new Treats restaurants: we’re always on the lookout, in Amsterdam, the Netherlands, and abroad!
VHTO is a foundation which promotes Diversity in IT. This platform is a collaboration between Oracle, IBM, Cisco, Lenovo, Microsoft and VHTO.

volunteer_experiences.description: Within Currnt I'm contributing to fully managed custom expert and influencer communities. Active Communities: "The Future of Higher Education and Its Impact on the Economy" and "Sensing Trends & Disruptions Impacting the Technology Workforce". Follow this Knowledge Stream through the following link: https://currnt.com/s645/sensing-trends-disruptions-impacting-the-technology-workforce.

https://www.linkedin.com/feed/update/urn:li:activity:6737638219191476224/

This initiative started with a call to action by prime minister Rutte of The Netherlands. In his last Corona press briefing before the summer holidays he called upon young people to raise to the challenge to come up with great ideas to make The Netherlands better and greater while we are facing the challenges of today and tomorrow, like a virus pandemic.

ICA, NL2025 and DOON offer High-Potential Young Professionals the opportunity to work in a brand new digital, cross-industry and  cross-cultural environment with fellow ICA members, trainers and coaches from DOON and support of NL2025. DOON offers a very innovative and  rich ideation platform to enable idea generation and development which  will improve your digital skillset in working in a fully digitalized  creative environment. We work in multidisciplinary and interdisciplinary teams and join in large national public-private partnerships. Our ideas will actually contribute in defining a (new) future for our country.

We came up with a new, innovative and practical idea to improve the future for young professionals. Throughout the whole process our team is guided by the coaches from DOON. 

Organizing team:
NL2025: Arthur Simonetti (DSM)
ICA: Bronte Klein (PwC), Julia Blok (Randstad) and Wesley Swildens (LeasePlan)
DOON: Berry Groenendijk, Erwin Niedeveld and Wim Barendregt

volunteer_experiences.description:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?time_continue=11&v=Nnlz7vvZR6k

Leiderschapsprogramma 'De Nieuwe Verbinders'
De Nieuwe Verbinders is een project van Diversion waarin ongeveer 50 jongeren tussen de 17 en 30 jaar uit Utrecht in 30 weken worden opgeleid tot de verbinder van morgen.

Wij geloven in een open stad, eentje waarin iedereen zich uit durft te spreken; waarin je de positieve confrontatie met elkaar aan gaat. Zo bouwen we bruggen tussen mensen en werelden. Dat is democratie!
